text: On Dangerous Ground is a 1951 American spy crime drama movie directed by Nicholas Ray and was based on the 1945 novel Mad with Much Heart by Gerald Butler. It stars Ida Lupino, Robert Ryan, Ward Bond, Charles Kemper, Ian Wolfe, Ed Begley and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 crime drama movies Category:1950s spy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Ray Category:Movies set in Colorado
title: On Dangerous Ground
